mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.batch_id AS "batchId", a.code AS "code", a.status AS "status", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.active_date AS "activeDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cdkey( batch_id, code, status, create_date, active_date ) VALUES ( #{batchId}, #{code}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{activeDate} )
